unittitle_ssm: Washington A. Roebling notes to Harvey Cooley
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of a small assortment of brief notes from Washington A. Roebling to Harvey Cooley, treasurer of John A. Roebling's Sons Company in Trenton, N.J., regarding business affairs.  The notes date from 1922 to 1925.
collection_ssm: Washington A. Roebling notes to Harvey Cooley
heading_ssm: Washington A. Roebling notes to Harvey Cooley

collection_sim: Washington A. Roebling notes to Harvey Cooley
